verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they draw nigh <S%G1448><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>, unto <S%G1519><s%> Bethphage <S%G967><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%>, at <S%G4314><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives <S%G1636><s%>, he sendeth <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Go your way <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> that is over against <S%G2713><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> straightway as <S%G2112><s%> ye enter <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, ye shall find <S%G2147><s%> a colt <S%G4454><s%> tied <S%G1909><s%>, whereon <S%G3739><s%> no man <S%G444><s%> ever yet <S%G3762><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%>; loose <S%G3089><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and bring him <S%G71><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any one <S%G5100><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> do ye <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>? say ye <S%G2036><s%>, The <S%G3754><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> he will send <S%G649><s%> him <S%G846><s%> back hither <S%G5602><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they went away <S%G565><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> a colt <S%G4454><s%> tied <S%G1210><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the open street <S%G296><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they loose <S%G3089><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of them that <S%G3588><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> do ye <S%G4160><s%>, loosing <S%G3089><s%> the colt <S%G4454><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had said <S%G1781><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they let <S%G863><s%> them <S%G846><s%> go <S%G863><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they bring <S%G71><s%> the colt <S%G4454><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G1911><s%> on him <S%G846><s%> their <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he sat <S%G2523><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> spread <S%G4766><s%> their <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> others <S%G243><s%> branches <S%G4746><s%>, which they had cut from <S%G1537><s%> the fields <S%G1186><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they that <S%G3588><s%> went before <S%G4254><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they that <S%G3588><s%> followed <S%G190><s%>, cried <S%G2896><s%>, <S%G3004><s%> Hosanna <S%G5614><s%>; Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he that <S%G3588><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>:

Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is the kingdom <S%G932><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%>, the kingdom of our <S%G2257><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> David <S%G1138><s%>: Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the highest <S%G5310><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G2532><s%> he had looked round about upon <S%G4017><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, it being now <S%G2235><s%> eventide <S%G3798><s%>, he went <S%G5607><s%> out <S%G1831><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> on the morrow <S%G1887><s%>, when they <S%G846><s%> were come <S%G1831><s%> out from <S%G575><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%>, he hungered <S%G3983><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> a fig tree <S%G4808><s%> afar off <S%G3113><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> leaves <S%G5444><s%>, he came <S%G2064><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> haply <S%G686><s%> he might find <S%G2147><s%> anything5100, 1722 thereon <S%G846><s%>: and when <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, he found <S%G2147><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> but <S%G3361><s%> leaves <S%G5444><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the season <S%G2540><s%> of figs <S%G4810><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto it <S%G846><s%>, No man <S%G3367><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%> henceforward <S%G3371><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> they come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, and began <S%G756><s%> to cast out <S%G1544><s%> them that <S%G3588><s%> sold <S%G4453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them that <S%G3588><s%> bought <S%G59><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> overthrew <S%G2690><s%> the tables <S%G5132><s%> of the money-changers <S%G2855><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the seats <S%G2515><s%> of them that <S%G3588><s%> sold <S%G4453><s%> the doves <S%G4058><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> he would <S%G863><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> suffer <S%G863><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> should carry <S%G1308><s%> a vessel <S%G4632><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he taught <S%G1321><s%>, and said <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Is it <S%G1125><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> written <S%G1125><s%>, My <S%G3450><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> shall be called <S%G2564><s%> a house <S%G3624><s%> of prayer <S%G4335><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%>? but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> have made <S%G4160><s%> it <S%G846><s%> a den <S%G4693><s%> of robbers <S%G3754><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it <S%G2532><s%>, and sought <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they might destroy <S%G622><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> they feared <S%G5399><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, for <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> was astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> teaching <S%G1322><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3753><s%> evening <S%G3796><s%> he <S%G1096><s%> went <S%G1096><s%> forth out of <S%G1854><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as they passed by <S%G3899><s%> in the morning <S%G4404><s%>, they saw <S%G1492><s%> the fig tree <S%G4808><s%> withered away <S%G3583><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the roots <S%G4491><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> whensoever <S%G3752><s%> ye stand <S%G4739><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%>, forgive <S%G863><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> aught <S%G5100><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> one <S%G2443><s%>; that your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> who is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> may forgive <S%G863><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> trespasses <S%G3900><s%>.
